attributes.action: Make it illegal for schools to deny students access to the toilets.
attributes.additional_details: It’s a basic human right to use the toilets, even during lesson time, 5 minutes in one lesson won’t damage learning. Sitting in a seat for 4-5 hours everyday without being able to use the toilets isn’t right.
attributes.background: Me, and most students from others schools are sick of schools having the right to deny students access during the toilets during lesson time, it is a human right. It’s not fair that only students with medical conditions are allowed in the toilets.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Require schools to allow students to have access to the toilet during lessons:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643422

We can also only publish petitions where a full name is given.
